app.description: App to chat via AI chatbot with structured documents like product manuals
app.title: Chat With Manuals

conversation.hallucination-alert: The AI may sometimes produce inaccurate answers, please always refer back to the original document for accurate information.
conversation.language-alert: Please use {locale, select, es {Spanish} en {English} other {Unknown}} in this conversation as the document is indexed in this language.
conversation.language-alert-brief: Conversation language: {locale, select, es {Spanish} en {English} other {Unknown}}
conversation.title: Chat: {title}

document-list-picker-modal.description: Select a document to open a new conversation with it.
document-list-picker-modal.title: Pick document

conversations.deleteConversationConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete conversation titled: {title} ?
conversations.title: Conversations

update-document-modal.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.

form-errors.image-must-be-valid: Image must be a JPEG, PNG or WebP file.
form-errors.title-max-length: Title must be at most 255 characters long.
form-errors.title-min-length: Title must be at least 3 characters long.

update-document-modal.title: Edit document information

form-errors.image-must-be-valid: Image must be a JPEG, PNG or WebP file.
form-errors.title-max-length: Title must be at most 255 characters long.
